org.jhove2.module.format.sgml
Interface OpenSpOptions

All Known Implementing Classes:
OnsgmlsOptions, SgmlNormOptions
public interface OpenSpOptions

Interface for options setting for OpenSp commands. See OpenSp documentation for more informatin about these commands and their options.

Author:
smorrissey

Field Summary
static String CATALOGOPT
          OpenSp "use catalog" option; followed by path to catalog file for resolving public and system identifiers
static int DEFAULTMAXERRORS
          default max error value employed by OpenSp
static String ERRFILEOPT
          OpenSp option to indicate path to error messages file (would otherwise default to standard err)
 
Method Summary
 String getCatalogPath()
          Return full path to SGML catalog file
 String getOptionString()
          Constructs command options string from configuration settings
 void setCatalogPath(String catalogPath)
          Set full path to SGML catalog file
